name: Black Hole Golfing
description:
Spacebar - to activate black hole

A reverse golfing game where you use gravity to pull golf balls into a black hole.

Made as part of Airplane Jam 2018.2 with the No Moss Studios. 

Airplane Jam is a game jam done during the flight between Sydney and Melbourne, which takes a bit less than 1 hour. Usually done before or after Melbourne International Games Week.
